data.title: Instituto Tecnológico de México
data.subtitle: Instituto Tecnológico de Morelia
data.description: I'm studying Computer Systems Engineering at the Instituto Tecnológico de México campus Morelia, I'm about to finish my 9th semester on the specialization of Cybersecurity. I've made a lot of scholar projects about every topic of the informatics, since web technologies to microcontroller and assembly language programing.

data.title: Cisco
data.subtitle: Netacad
data.description:
I have a couple of certificades of the program Cisco CCNA Routing and Switching (CCNA R&S) from Cisco Netacad and the Instituto Tecnológico de Morelia: Introduction to routing and switching; and Network Scaling. 
 Also, I have a certificade of Introduction to Cybersecurity by this institute.

data.title: Platzi
data.subtitle: Online academy
data.description: I've taken many of the courses presented by Platzi as a reinforcement of the topics taken at my university, with this courses I enhanced  my knowledge on some technologies like: Python, JavaScript, NodeJS, React, Docker, Kubernetes, etc.
